title: Pirate Royalty
description: Pirate Royalty is an open-world MMORPG built in Unreal Engine 5. Engage in epic PvP battles, team up with others for greater rewards, and forge powerful weapons to rise through the ranks. Early access launches for free in Summer 2025.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Pirate Royalty brings players together with its party system. Engage in thrilling PvP battles within dungeons, where honor points can be exchanged for valuable items. Progression is richly rewarding, with skill points and stat points earned at each level, allowing for deep character customization and mastery.

The game’s vibrant, humorous art style is complemented by stunning visual effects, bringing every battle, ability, and environment to life with a lot of detail. Exaggerated character animations and colorful landscapes make the world of Pirate Royalty feel fresh and dynamic. With a rich inventory system, a lot of cool VFX, and a focus on cooperation, this MMORPG is an adventure best experienced with friends!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Characters and Classes in Pirate Royalty
<!--text-->
### **Lance**
- Swordsman: Experts in dual swords and close combat. 
→ Progresses to Crusader

-  Hunter: Masters of long-range combat, using either a bow or a gun.
 → Progresses to Sharpshooter

- Explorer: Magic class specializing in sea-based powers.
 → Progresses to Voyager

### **Phyllis**


- Hunter: Skilled in ranged attacks, using bow or gun.
→ Progresses to Sharpshooter

- Herbalist: A support magic class, focused on healing and nature-based magic.
→ Progresses to Seal Master or Cleric

- Explorer: A magic class focused on discovery and mastery of sea magic.
→ Progresses to Voyager

### **Carsise**

- Swordsman:  Focuses on dual swords for defense and damage.
 → Progresses to Champion

### **Ami**

- Explorer: Skilled in navigation and magic related to the sea.
→ Progresses to Voyager

- Herbalist: A support magic class with healing and nature magic.
 → Progresses to Cleric or Seal Master

<!--image-->
![Pirate Royalty-llsxi](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0ab81d0a4cb2416897ed00b37087a7d1/pirate-royalty-llsxi.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Progression System
<!--text-->
As you level up, you’ll earn skill points and stat points to customize your character and improve their abilities. The progression system allows you to tailor your playstyle, making each character unique. Whether you focus on strength, agility, or magic, you have full control over how you grow your character.

<!--image-->
![Pirate Royalty-1t5rm](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0ab81d0a4cb2416897ed00b37087a7d1/pirate-royalty-1t5rm.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Party System
<!--text-->
Team up with friends or meet new allies to tackle challenging quests and dungeons. The party system lets you share rewards and experience, enhancing the cooperative gameplay experience. Whether you’re exploring new areas or facing powerful bosses, working together is key to success.

<!--image-->
![Pirate Royalty-1u788](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0ab81d0a4cb2416897ed00b37087a7d1/pirate-royalty-1u788.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# PVP Honor System
<!--text-->
Engage in epic PvP battles within dungeons and earn honor points for your victories. These points can be exchanged for exclusive items, providing a rewarding competitive aspect for those who enjoy proving their strength in combat. The PVP Honor System adds depth to the game’s progression and gives players a reason to hone their battle skills.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Forging System
<!--text-->
Make  your weapons stronger by forging powerful gems into them. The Forging System allows you to socket gems into your gear, making your weapons stronger and adding unique abilities. Collect rare gems throughout the game and experiment with different combinations to create the ultimate weapon for your playstyle.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Forsaken City
<!--text-->
A challenging dungeon where you can engage in PvP battles while farming for valuable items and gems. The Forsaken City offers both combat and loot opportunities, making it a hot spot for players looking to level up, collect rare resources, and prove their might against other adventurers.
